description.en: Son of Śivayya of Śrīśaila, known as Manganna, held that position by his directions and became well-known as Kaivalya Yogi, ascended to the status of a Rājayogi and remaining (in that position) for eighty three years accomplished realisation in the evening of Makarasaṅkrānti of the year Sarvadhāri.

shlokas:
zrIzailIyazivayyasUnuradadhAt tasyAjJayA tat padaM maGgaNNArya iti zrutaH paramahO kaivalyayOgiprathaH.
ArUDhaH zivarAjayOgapadavIM tiSThaMstryazItiM samAH siddhO'bhUt sa ca sarvadhArimakarakrAntau ca sAyAhani..16..
—puNyazlOkamaJjarI
